content: did you know the sunflower is the national flower of ukraine it represents the warmth and strength of the sun the main part of this project is worked in rounds so you might want to use a stitch marker to mark the end of each round there is no specific gauge for this project just try to keep it tight and even throughout each piece sunflower measures approx 11cm 4 3in when using the same yarn and tools indicated below skill level easy/intermediate **materials** croché estrela tricot baby + 100% cotton yarn 50g / 105m in blue approx 4g brown approx 2g green approx 2g and yellow approx 3g 3mm crochet hook stuffing small piece of cardboard or pellets craft pipe cleaner tapestry needle scissors
